chinese: indicating the relationship between a part and a whole.
indicating the accompanying presence of someone or something.
indicating the location or time of an event.
indicating the source or origin of something.
indicating movement from the outside to the inside of something.
indicating a period of time when an event is taking place.
indicating the presence of someone or something as part of a larger group.
indicating the end of a period of time.
indicating physical contact with someone or something.
indicating being a member of a group or in the midst of something.
indicating something that occurs or exists in every part of a place or thing.
indicating something happening despite a circumstance or obstacle.
indicating movement in the direction of something.
indicating something happening immediately after something else.
indicating something that relates to or is about something.
indicating the direction or movement towards a place or person.
indicating being located inside an enclosed space.
indicating the purpose or intended use of something.
indicating physical contact with a surface or being positioned on top of something.
indicating the means or method of doing something.
indicating the topic of something.
indicating similarity or resemblance between two things.
indicating movement from one side of something to the other side.
indicating movement from one side to another side of something.
indicating the time or event occurring earlier than another time or event.
indicating the relationship of two things or people when they are separated by something else.
indicating the time or event occurring later than another time or event.
indicating the time period from a past event until now.
indicating the absence or lack of something.
indicating physical contact with the lower surface of something.
indicating being inside or contained within something.
indicating movement in the same direction as something else.
indicating occurring after something else.
indicating movement from one side to the opposite side of something.
indicating being at the back of something or someone.
indicating something being at or to the further side of something else.
indicating addition or inclusion.
indicating exclusion or something that is not included.
indicating a contrast or something that is not part of something else.
indicating movement in a higher direction.
indicating movement away from the inside of something.
indicating movement in a circular direction or surrounding something.
indicating movement in a lower direction.
indicating separation or disconnection.
indicating something being at a higher level or position than something else.
indicating being close or in proximity to something or someone.
